headline: Student Loan Sales
pros: I worked remotely, but the home office people were wonderful.
cons: Company sold off to Cardtronics.  Student lending program dissolved.

headline: Director of Data Processing and Merchant Services
author_position: Director of Data Processing and Merchant Services
pros: Well, they used to buy lunch for the office.  Raises for the first 7 years were great until the merge/take-over happened.  Benefits were good as well.
cons: Management did not hold people accountable for their mistakes which made other people do twice as much work to correct the errors.

headline: Great Experience, Learned a Lot
pros: Challenging and fast paced educational experience
cons: Overworked, high pressure. For the position held, pay rate is lower than industry rate

headline: Not Great
pros: The work load was never very difficult.
cons: Very low pay for the position.
